title: Did Mark Twain say "afraid of the media, because they would steal your honor "?
subtitle: The outdated use of the word "media" is just one reason to question a quote often attributed to the American author Mark Twain.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Mark Twain said: "Don't be afraid of the enemy, because your enemy can only take your life. You'd better be afraid of the media because they're gonna steal your honor.
